name: Eugene L. COON, Sheriff, Appellee, v. The CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION FOR ALLEGHENY COUNTY POLICE AND FIREMEN. Appeal of Deputy Meir HORVITZ

parties: Eugene L. COON, Sheriff, Appellee, v. The CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION FOR ALLEGHENY COUNTY POLICE AND FIREMEN. Appeal of Deputy Meir HORVITZ.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of the case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
679 A.2d 1263
Eugene L. COON, Sheriff, Appellee, v. The CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION FOR ALLEGHENY COUNTY POLICE AND FIREMEN. Appeal of Deputy Meir HORVITZ.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 5, 1996.
Decided July 26, 1996.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.
